question: Which of the following ways is used to calculate intelligence quotient (IQ)?

answers.option: Subtracting mental age from chronological age
Dividing chronological age by mental age
Multiplying mental age with chronological age
Dividing mental age by chronological age
Subtracting chronological age from mental age
